member.name: NMTBGETINFOTIPA
member.summary: Contains and receives infotip information for a toolbar item. This structure is used with the TBN_GETINFOTIP notification code.

member.name: NMTBGETINFOTIPA.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: NMTBGETINFOTIPA.pszText
member.summary: Address of a character buffer that receives the infotip text.

member.name: NMTBGETINFOTIPA.cchTextMax
member.summary: Size of the buffer, in characters, atpszText. In most cases, the buffer will be INFOTIPSIZE characters in size, but you should always make sure that your application does not copy more thancchTextMax characters to the buffer atpszText.

member.name: NMTBGETINFOTIPA.iItem
member.summary: The command identifier of the item for which infotip information is being requested. This member is filled in by the control before sending the notification code.

member.name: NMTBGETINFOTIPA.lParam
member.summary: The application-defined value associated with the item for which infotip information is being requested. This member is filled in by the control before sending the notification code.
